languages.text: "Иногда молчание — лучший ответ. Но неужели ты приш{mf|ел|ла} лишь для этого?"
"Sometimes silence is the best answer. But is it really what you have come here for?"
languages.original_text: "Иногда молчание — лучший ответ. Но неужели ты приш{mf|ел|ла} лишь для этого?"

traits.locale_text: "Sometimes silence is the best answer. But is it really what you have come here for?"
"Sometimes silence is the best answer. But is it really what you have come here for?"
"Sometimes silence is the best answer. But is it really what you have come here for?"
"Sometimes silence is the best answer. But is it really what you have come here for?"
"Sometimes silence is the best answer. But is it really what you have come here for?"

languages.text: “有的时候，沉默是最好的回答。不过，这真的是你的本意吗？”
languages.original_text: "Sometimes silence is the best answer. But is it really what you have come here for?"

traits.locale_text: “有的时候，沉默是最好的回答。不过，这真的是你的本意吗？”

languages.text: «En ocasiones, el silencio es la mejor respuesta. Pero ¿de verdad has venido solo para eso?».
languages.original_text: "Sometimes silence is the best answer. But is it really what you have come here for?"

traits.locale_text: «En ocasiones, el silencio es la mejor respuesta. Pero ¿de verdad has venido solo para eso?».

languages.text: 「時には沈黙が最善の回答である場合もある。だが、それがお前がここに来た本当の目的なのか？」
languages.original_text: "Sometimes silence is the best answer. But is it really what you have come here for?"

traits.locale_text: 「時には沈黙が最善の回答である場合もある。だが、それがお前がここに来た本当の目的なのか？」

languages.text: "Manchmal ist Schweigen die beste Antwort. Aber seid Ihr wirklich dafür gekommen?"
languages.original_text: "Sometimes silence is the best answer. But is it really what you have come here for?"

traits.locale_text: "Manchmal ist Schweigen die beste Antwort. Aber seid Ihr wirklich dafür gekommen?"

languages.text: « Le silence est parfois la meilleure des réponses, mais est-ce vraiment pour cela que vous êtes {mf|venu|venue} ici ? »
languages.original_text: "Sometimes silence is the best answer. But is it really what you have come here for?"

traits.locale_text: « Le silence est parfois la meilleure des réponses, mais est-ce vraiment pour cela que vous êtes {mf|venu|venue} ici ? »

languages.text: "Sessizlik bazen en iyi yanıttır. Peki sen buraya bana bu yanıtı vermeye mi geldin?"
languages.original_text: "Sometimes silence is the best answer. But is it really what you have come here for?"
